name: Pink Panther's Epic Adventure
description: Go on an underwater adventure with everyone's favorite panther! Choose your submarine, pick a captain, and adventure into the depths of the sea! Select from the Pink Panther, the Inspector, Littleman, Ant or the Aardvark, and even Cato to command your submarine! Collect gems and power-ups along the way to find the lost world maps and complete missions. Check the leaderboards to see if you've gone farther than your friends!
